comment: One of my elks is horribly mis-cut, making the game unplayable.

Frustrierendes Spiel, hat in unseren Spielrunden wenig Spaß gemacht. Oft schnippst man 20-30 mal hintereinander und lässt den hässlichen Elch nur auf der Stelle tappen. Kaum Interaktion und einfach kein Spannungsbogen- meist wünscht man sich nach ein paar Minuten, das Spiel vorzeitig abzubrechen.

As usual with this series, something is missing. Probably a third player.
I wanted to love this, but it was never fun to play. I find flicking game hard to like in general.
Fun flicking game taken to the minimalistic core.

I'm not overly convinced about the monetary value of a box with ten bits of wood in it, but in a suitable frame of mind, this is uproarious fun - a lowbrow Polarity, if you will. Play it with the right person and the benefit of a few drinks; cries of laughter and shouts of 'wet moose!' will echo into the night.

First copy traded with Farmers Of The Moor for Formula D

Second copy traded with Agricola Express for Minden Playing Card Cricket

Best with 4 (need two sets, though)
Verified. Both copies Very Good condition. One copy missing one gray disc.
Playing with more than 2 people is really fun. Teams of 2 is pretty fun chaos
Very simple. easy to play a few rounds. can be tricky to be good at it. My friend 3D printed me my own.
Beautifully simple, portable design. Don’t lose any pieces at the pub.
